tool_description: Screenshotlayer is a lighweight REST API built to deliver high quality PNG, JPEG & GIF website screenshots at unparalleled speeds and through a simple interface. Its architecture is focused on ease of use and integration, making for a high level of compatibility with any application, framework and programming language.
name: screenshotlayer
title: screenshotlayer

api_list.name: Main Endpoint - Capture Screenshot

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The website URL you want to take a screenshot of

optional_parameters.name: fullpage
optional_parameters.description: set to "1" in order to capture the full height of the page

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: define thumbnail width in pixels - e.g. 200

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output formats: PNG, JPEG and GIF

optional_parameters.name: secret_key
optional_parameters.description: Specify Secret Key - read more at https://screenshotlayer.com/documentation#url_encryption

optional_parameters.name: css_url
optional_parameters.description: Append a CSS stylesheet URL in order to inject it into the target website

optional_parameters.name: ttl
optional_parameters.description: Specify caching time (time-to-live) for your screenshot - default: 2592000 seconds (30 days)

optional_parameters.name: placeholder
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 in order to use default placeholder image, or set to any image URL in order to use a custom placeholder

optional_parameters.name: export
optional_parameters.description: Append either S3 Bucket path (format: API_KEY:API_SECRET@bucket) or FTP path (format: ftp://user:password@server)

optional_parameters.name: viewport
optional_parameters.description: Viewport size - format: "width x height", e.g. 375x667 for iPhone 6

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Specify delay time in seconds - e.g. 3

optional_parameters.name: force
optional_parameters.description: set to 1 in order to force the API to capture fresh screenshot
